summary: bangla diskipas paratkagains  hasa in images kusaratan sit bangla diska secret weapon in he images micuba or vohe fashion copri textiles .

bangla teso least developing nation is categrymedalve sungar puralatalekin actualle bangla dee good news oke feone trade ma preference milelega is a generalized system of preference gate a huta e heki unke exports go duty ani tax lagtanito hotake unke kapre orsa tete develop te shokele .

bangla tis textile industry grew from just twenty eight billion dollars to seventy five billion dollars in twenty twenty is model catisa point har related and supporting industries panglate smit banks raw material suppliers insurance companies insurance companies logistics companies subsat milger camkor kentaky dish exports barasak paratme textile industry a raw material manufacturing export .

situation mahame ready rehnahi hoga osake coach companies altenates runde para kile bedy opportunity yeheki bangla des capresarubanata legin unke pas raw materials n vo ye sara import china secrta tukaamune convince nake sate e raw materials .
